entry.title: VPS - UK2 - host1437034
entry.content:
May 25, 07:41 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected switches

lon1-eri1-pciz1host28-a70

Affected racks

E101C20

Affected hosts

host1437034

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.


vps-2f003b2b.vps.ovh.net

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - W17A02
entry.content:
May 25, 00:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/05/2023 23:02 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 23:40 UTC
Root cause : Issue on a cooling system module.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 24, 23:20 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/05/2023 23:02 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently unvailable in this rack W17A02.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
